Name: Urban Legend: The Rogue Constructor
Description: In the Collapsed Arcbend Ravine, an urban legend takes shape. Strange sounds, and an inexplicable "ghost" that can't be shut down... On a rainy night, gather your courage and go take a look! Are you ready to uncover the truth?
QuestDesc: In the Collapsed Arcbend Ravine, an urban legend takes shape. Strange sounds, and an inexplicable "ghost" that can't be shut down... On a rainy night, gather your courage and go take a look! Are you ready to uncover the truth?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Eh? {PlayerName} is calling me first? Don't tell me... you're finally ready to join the club, huh?

Options.PlotLineKey: That's a no, and I'm calling because...

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait, the rain is really loud. You're outside… Are you in the Collapsed Ravine right now?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah. Rainy night. The Collapsed Ravine. A Route Constructor spouting creepy lines. And...

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...A road suspended in midair looking like it might fall any second.

Options.PlotLineKey: So you knew. No wonder you wanted me to check it out.
This one is in your club archives, huh?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course! Don't underestimate my "database," hehe!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me put it this way, if it's an unexplained story or a paranormal rumor in Lahai-Roi—firsthand, witnessed, or just gossip—it's in my files.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me think… Right! The first report came from a Voidmatters student. She said that on rainy nights, one of those printing Constructors appears in the Etching Plains and starts building a road...

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No deployment record matches it. No team claims it. A Route Constructor that appears out of nowhere, like a ghost tied to rainy nights.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She even got a video. Caused a huge stir. Some called it a hoax, others said it was a cover-up for a cursed zone...

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then poof! The video vanished. Wiped clean. The whole discussion just... died.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmph, she had so much potential... Why didn't I recruit her?! A missed opportunity... Wait, I'm getting off track!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, look around. Besides the road, is there anything else you can see...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Her voice is swallowed by a sudden crack of thunder. A flash of lightning pierces the rain. A shadow darts past, flickering in and out of view.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: On the floating road, a riderless motorcycle glides like a phantom, its engine rumbling low.

Options.PlotLineKey: The motorcycle, right? I see it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That was the big debate.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some think the bike is a coincidence. Others say it's part of the urban legend and that you should stay far away. Unlike the road, it moves. It could charge right at you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I think the motorcycle is the key… {PlayerName}, do you trust me?

Options.PlotLineKey: You know more about urban legends than I do.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The motorcycle doesn't need to be here. It's an extra, an optional part of the scene.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And that Route Constructor keeps building the road… Doesn't it feel like it's building a racetrack just for the motorcycle?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Route Constructor keeps building the road… Doesn't it feel like it's building a racetrack just for the motorcycle?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So it's not just building the road. It's recreating an entire scene! A moment frozen in the rain! You know what that means, {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chase that motorcycle! Break the pattern and see what happens!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, I'm not sure... that's why I'm asking if you trust me!

Options.PlotLineKey: Let's take the chance. Nothing to lose.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You try to shut down the Route Constructor, but find it has no power source. It isn't connected to any grid.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There's no way to shut it down. Its red lights pulse faster as the road stretches outward, a suspended pathway hovering in the air, looking ready to collapse at any second.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (An unexplainable phenomenon, or an urban legend…? Is this why Mayo wanted me here? I should call her.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Phew. So that's... it?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hold on! Is that a storage module? Did the Route Constructor just spit that out?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No way... That speed was insane. It was way too fast.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's okay. You did great. You were only off by a tiny, tiny bit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It is its home turf, after all. Who knows how many times it's run this route? We'll just have to try again next time!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Night falls. Red lights flicker through a curtain of rain, carrying the damp, metallic smell of iron and dirt.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rhythmic Trembling Sound
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Creak— THUMP—

Dialogues.Speaker: Rhythmic Trembling Sound
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Creak— THUMP— Creak—

Options.PlotLineKey: What is that sound? Some kind of banging...

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rainy night conditions detected. Condition… matched.
Mis…sion—initiated.
Do not… interfere.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A strange male voice grates through the air, raspy and spooky like a blade scraping glass.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You turn around to lay eyes on a Route Constructor. Its exterior is weathered, and its serial number is barely recognizable. Looks like it hasn't been in service for a long time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Route Constructor (Strange Male Voice)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mis…sion—initiated.

Dialogues.Speaker: Route Constructor (Strange Male Voice)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do not… interfere.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No way... That speed was insane. It was way too fast.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's okay. You did great. You were only off by a tiny, tiny bit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It is its home turf, after all. Who knows how many times it's run this route? We'll just have to try again next time!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The trembling stops. The Route Constructor's red glow fades into a steady, calm light. When it speaks again, its voice is gentle, delivering its final announcement.

Dialogues.Speaker: Route Constructor (Soft Male Voice)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rainy night conditions detected. Condition matched.

Dialogues.Speaker: Route Constructor (Soft Male Voice)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Test initiated... Failed. Test subject missing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Route Constructor (Soft Male Voice)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Repeat: Test subject "K. Nelson" missing. Test initiation failed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Route Constructor (Soft Male Voice)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Correcting objective—Initiate repair infrastructure. Escort K. Nelson to safety. Prevent his death.

Dialogues.Speaker: Route Constructor (Soft Male Voice)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mission... start... Mission... end.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Route Constructor falls silent, as if its power has been cut for good.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...{PlayerName}, do you think Nelson's final test was a success in the end?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Was rebuilding that road every rainy night simply a glitch, just it replaying the moment Nelson died? Or... was it making its own choice, trying to undo a single, tragic regret?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ugh, a conclusion you can neither prove nor disprove. Annoying... also kind of heartbreaking.

Options.PlotLineKey: Maybe that's the charm of the paranormal.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? Didn't expect you to say that!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But... I still believe that souls are real. And that Route Constructor's soul? Maybe it's in the very programming K. Nelson poured his heart into.
